contents.text: Thank you for calling LiveRamp in San Francisco, your identity resolution middleware partner for seamless data integration across marketing platforms.
For sales inquiries and product demos, press 1.
If you'd like to schedule a live demo of our identity resolution platform, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a sales representative to schedule your demo.

navigationGoals: Schedule a live demo of the identity resolution platform
I’d like to schedule a live demo of your identity resolution platform for my veteran outreach program.
I'd like to schedule a live demo of the identity resolution platform.
I’d like to schedule a live demo of your platform, please.
I’d like to schedule a live demo of your identity resolution platform to evaluate its data integration capabilities for a university research project.

contents.text: To learn about pricing, plans, and licensing options, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with a sales representative for pricing details.

navigationGoals: Get detailed pricing and licensing options for LiveRamp
I need details on pricing and licensing options to support my veteran service project.
I need detailed pricing and licensing information for LiveRamp’s services.
I’m calling to find out about your pricing and licensing options.
I need details on pricing, plans, and licensing options for using LiveRamp in an academic setting.

contents.text: For technical support and integration assistance, press 2.
If you need help with setup, integration, or troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Get help with setup and integration of the platform
I need help integrating your identity solution into my CRM to manage veteran contacts.
I need help troubleshooting my LiveRamp API integration.
I need help with setup and integration of your system.
I’m looking for help troubleshooting the API integration of LiveRamp’s identity resolution service with our experimental data pipeline.

contents.text: To check on the status of an existing support case, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve your support case details.

navigationGoals: Check the status of my existing support case
I’d like an update on the support ticket I opened about our integration issue.
I want to check the status of my open support case.
I’d like an update on the status of my support case.
I’d like an update on the status of my existing support case about the API connectivity issue.
